Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the misaligned bridge by referring to it as one of the "worst construction mistakes" of all-time.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove the existence of a misaligned bridge.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photograph shows a misaligned bridge without providing any factual basis for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert's verdict explains that the image is not a photograph of an actual misaligned bridge but an illustration created by an insurance company. This alternative explanation contradicts the claim.
